name: Lin Lin's homepage
body:
### Lin Lin, Assistant Professor
Email: fxlinlin@tonji.edu.cn
Address:
Rm 733, Zhi Xin Building, 
4800, Cao'an Highway, Shanghai 201804, China 
 

### Short Bio
I graduated from Tianjin University, China with Bachelor and Master degree in 2004 and 2007, respectively, and obtained my Ph.D degree from Nanyang Technological University, Singapore in 2012. Now I am an assistant professor in the College of Electronics and Information Engineering, Tongji University, China.


### Research Interest
Molecular communication, smart wearable devices.

### Selected Publications
Journal papers:
1. L. Lin, F. Li, M. Ma, H. Yan, “Synchronization of Bio-Nanomachines Based on Molecular Diffusion”, IEEE Sensors Journal, 2016, published online (SCI IF = 1.889, JCR Q2)
2. L. Lin, C. Yang, M. Ma, S. Ma, H. Yan, “A Clock Synchronization Method for Molecular Nanomachines in Bionanosensor networks”, IEEE Sensors Journal, 2016, published online (SCI IF = 1.889, JCR Q2)
Conference papers:
1. C. Yang, L. Lin*, F. Li, M. Ma, S. Ma, “Reference Broadcast Synchronization for Nanomachines via Diffusive Molecular Communication”, IEEE International Instrumentation and Measurement Technology Conference (I2MTC), Taipei, Taiwan, May 23-26, 2016, accepted and presented (Corresponding author)
2. Z. Luo, L. Lin*, M. Ma, “Offset Estimation for Clock Synchronization in Mobile Molecular Communication System”, IEEE WCNC 2016, accepted and presented (Corresponding author)
3. L. Lin, C. Yang, M. Ma, S. Ma, “Parameter Estimation of Inverse Gaussian Distribution Channel of Diffusion-Based Molecular Communication”, IEEE WCNC 2016, accepted and presented
4. L. Lin, C. Yang, M. Ma, “Offset and Skew Estimation for Clock Synchronization in Molecular Communication Systems”, 9th EAI International Conference on Bio-inspired Information and Communications Technologies (BICT), New York, United States, Dec. 3-5, 2015: 152-157
5. F. Li, L. Lin*, C. Yang, M. Ma, “Evaluation of Molecular Oscillation for Nanonetworks Based on Quorum Sensing”, The 1st Workshop on Nanotechnology in Instrumentation and Measurement (NanoFIM), Lecce, Italy, July 24-25, 2015, accepted and presented


### Professional activities
Session Chair: 
   IEEE WCNC, session “Molecular communication”, Qatar, 2016
   ICUFN, China, 2014

Reviewers: 
   IEEE Transactions on Information Technology in Biomedicine (TITB)
   IEEE Transactions on Biomedical Engineering (TBME)
   IEEE Transactions on Nanotechnology (TNANO)
   IEEE Transactions on Nanobioscience 
   IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics (J-BHI)
   IEEE Sensors Journal
   IEEE Communications Letters
   IEEE Access


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
